KnowledgeBase.Title: Example List compareLT 020
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: compare compareEQ compareGE compareGT compareNE compareLE

Example.Description: These examples use the compareLT functions to do a case-sensitive comparison of two objects of the same type. A Boolean value is returned.

Syntax.Expression: <sc> (compareLT '(a b c d e) '(a (b c) (d e) g )) </sc>
Syntax.Note: The first Quoted List is greater than the second List.
The first List is lesser than the second Pair.
